info.name: CNAME Fingerprint
author: pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 191
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;pad.incubateur.net.	IN	 CNAME
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 191
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;pad.incubateur.net.	IN	 CNAME

;; ANSWER SECTION:
pad.incubateur.net.	3600	IN	CNAME	betagouv-codimd.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 27642
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;pad.incubateur.net.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 27642
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;pad.incubateur.net.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
pad.incubateur.net.	3578	IN	CNAME	betagouv-codimd.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.
betagouv-codimd.osc-fr1.scalingo.io.	278	IN	CNAME	sc-lb-pool-01.osc-fr1.scalingo-network.com.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
scalingo-network.com.	1800	IN	SOA	burt.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2277339532 10000 2400 604800 3600

author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: pad.incubateur.net
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
